mdRecord.dcterms:description: This handwritten note is on paper although it references a piece of leather: "Leather found beneath attic floor believed to have been left during occupancy of Union Army -- 1864. Note: the name of Captain Dinwiddie." The accompanying note indicates that this paper was found under the floorboards in the attic at Blandome.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Paper Found Under Floorboards at Blandome
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
Vacation homes
African Americans -- Recreation
